author: pgwadapool
title: DeepchainAda: Trustless AI training
description: Descentralizar el aprendizaje automático federado garantizando la privacidad para permitir la colaboración abierta, útil en aplicaciones como el descubrimiento de fármacos con IA

f6_assessments.q0:
El proponente sugiere un nuevo enfoque para investigar las formas en que se podría detectar el COVID utilizando la IA. El proponente ha proporcionado un análisis sobre los intentos existentes en el mercado para abordar este problema y por qué se han quedado cortos. A continuación, se describe una tercera opción que aprovechará las características que ofrecen los contratos inteligentes y la criptografía para la privacidad.

Los contratos inteligentes, SingularityNET y NuNet son los componentes de esta propuesta que, según el autor, será de código abierto. Junto con los antecedentes dados sobre el proponente en el espacio con videos educativos hay una alta probabilidad de que esta propuesta pueda tener un alto impacto y proporcionar ejemplos a la comunidad, así como un caso de uso que podría tener implicaciones globales.
f6_assessments.q1:
El proponente proporciona detalles de su propio sitio web con contenido de YouTube. A través de estos vídeos se ofrecen explicaciones claras sobre las áreas temáticas del aprendizaje automático, Haskell y los contratos inteligentes. Todas estas fuentes proporcionan confianza en que el proponente será capaz de ejecutar esta propuesta.

El presupuesto es bajo teniendo en cuenta la complejidad del problema de la propuesta. Es posible que el proponente tenga que solicitar más fondos u optar por completar la propuesta sin más financiación, lo que supone un riesgo notable para la viabilidad de la propuesta. El presupuesto se centra en los requisitos de hardware y no detalla el tiempo de los proponentes.

En futuras propuestas sería estupendo disponer de información sobre el motivo por el que el proponente no ha incluido un presupuesto para su tiempo y las implicaciones que ello puede tener para su capacidad de ejecución de la propuesta. Con esa información añadida, un asesor comunitario podría darles fácilmente una calificación máxima en el futuro. También sería estupendo ver un perfil de LinkedIn o algo más de información sobre los antecedentes del proponente (los vídeos de YouTube eran al menos una gran fuente para verificar los conocimientos del proponente hasta cierto punto)
f6_assessments.q2: En términos de claridad, la propuesta es de alta calidad, con referencias a otros trabajos e información detallada sobre el mercado, lo que demuestra que el proponente tiene un buen conocimiento del mercado y del problema. Se proporciona un conjunto de indicadores clave de rendimiento que detallan lo que la solución tendrá que lograr para ser un éxito. Junto con los hitos, un plan para abrir el código y el bajo riesgo del presupuesto para la comunidad, la auditabilidad de esta propuesta es alta.
f6_assessments.reply: Thank you for the feedback. I am glad that you found my YouTube videos helpful.

f6_assessments.q0: Machines educating eachother by adding data and retransmitting new parameters through a peer-to-peer service could have a significant impact on the way ML is performed. Deploying this system on Mithril ensures that the influence any party can exert does not supercede the stake input by that party. All this while preserving privacy, which is important for both legal and ethical reasons. Certainly a technology that could prove its worth in the future not only in the medical field, but pretty much anywhere because of its modular nature. However, to my knowledge there has not been a release of Mithril at this time and there is no indication that this will coincide with the development of this proposed project.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer's educational Youtube-channel is highly technical, confirming that the proposer has the technical capabilities to set up this system but it is unclear who is in the team and how many people it holds. Feasibility could be increased if this information is present in the proposal.
f6_assessments.q2:
The proposal is very auditable but has overlooked something that will need a risk assessment to handle: What would happen if the input data is faulty?  
Auditability could be improved by adding a short infographic image to clarify the prospected framework.
f6_assessments.reply:
Thank you for the feedback.
Please note that Mithril is not planned in the first version. The Mithril concept is mainly for keys and still under development and I cannot directly use it as Ada is not the main stake in DeepchainAda. 
 
Regarding team, I am in the process of hiring one intern who is going to assist me in this project. The intern will join in Feb-2022

Regarding the Auditablity, please note that we are using NonInteractive Zero Knowledge proofs using the sigma protocols. So every party who is involved in the training will provide proof of their computation, a third party can then audit this. I am creating a detailed white paper and I love your idea of adding an infographic. I will incorporate that. Also please watch my YouTube video on security challenges. In that I have talked about lazy participants. This includes party with wrong data, or party not updating parameters at all etc.

f6_assessments.q0: This project looks to expand and build on the various use cases the SingularityNet teams are developing and this meets the expectations of the challenge.  This project is focused on AI/ML aspects and this is growing topic of interest in tech spaces currently and could have broader impacts to spread Cardano and SingularityNet further.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer is an SPO, educator, and Haskell developer and has relevant experience both in the Cardano side of things as well as in the AI/ML learning side.  With the scope of the project and the implementation plan listed the proposal is highly likely to successfully implement the solution proposed.
f6_assessments.q2: There is a section in the proposal strictly discussing the auditability of the project and describes how the project will be implemented as well as the transparency of what the total costs necessary from the funding will be.

f6_assessments.q0: Developing a system where MachineLearning is developed using AI technologies (NuNet and Singularity Framework) by utilizing Cardano Smart contracts could increase use-cases on both sights. By focusing on ML also ensures that it's a self-sustaining environment.
f6_assessments.q1: For feasibility, we are missing some crucial information. The plan itself is technical to a point where it's still understandable and the youtube link provided gives us clarity on how much the proposers are into this project. But what we are missing is critical information on who the team is, how many team members are they, what is the background information on them. We get some insight on this on the provided website but not enough to make a good assessment.
f6_assessments.q2: Regarding the audit on this proposal, it should have no shortcomings besides the background information on the team. We get a well worked-out plan and although it seems the proposer or proposers plan to only ask for funding of the material cost.

f6_assessments.q0: Using the Cardano network for distributing machine learning data but guaranteeing privacy and auditability can be very useful and is a perfect example of project for this challenge so this is a proposal innovative and perfect for the challenge
f6_assessments.q1: I think that the proposal is widely explained. It has lots of details and from a tecnical view it is very complete. The plan has several steps to follow it perfectly and I am sure that the person who is presenting the proposal know a lot about everything needed, but I cannot give the 5 stars because I need more specific information about the team
f6_assessments.q2: KPIs are very useful and they are provided, so it is something to take into account. I would like to appreciate how to audit the success, because we only have the plan but it is not clear the final result of each step, thats is why I cannot give 5 stars here
f6_assessments.reply:
Thank you for the feedback. I am an SPO of PGWAD and I constantly provide technical content in Youtube and also I have a daily tweet series on twitter about Haskell and Zero Knowledge proofs.
I am hiring an intern who is scheduled to join in Feb-2022. So you will hear more about this project and team as we progress along.

I will work on your feedback about "final result of each step".

f6_assessments.q0: Proposal describes using Cardano, SingularityNet smart contracts and DeepchainAda project to ensure Privacy & Auditability. Great proposition for connectivity while still ensuring privacy, it will open up a lot of use cases in the corporate world when it's proven. Solution stating Plutus smart contract and advanced cryptographic techniques to help Distributed Machine Learning and interface the model with SingularityNet Framework using AI DSL
f6_assessments.q1: The proponent clearly states the solution and implementation plan focusing on the smart contract and the solution with video documentation and website. You should add identity, expertise, and experience that are easy to verify with the reader would be greatly appreciated. Cost 8000$ per computer, I think there is a mistake here.
f6_assessments.q2: Clear milestones in 3,6,10,12 months and with KPIs to be achieved. The proponent should add some risk challenges affecting the project with solutions if any, I believe this will make the proposal more appreciated.

solution: Utilizar los contratos inteligentes de Cardano, SingularityNet y el proyecto DeepchainAda para garantizar la privacidad y la auditabilidad en la formación de ML
experience: SPO de metal desnudo, [PGWAD], desarrollador de Haskell y educador de YouTube sobre Blockchain+DeepLearning
